title: When Seeds Take Root
description: For die hard Everleaf fans, "When Seeds Take Root" explores the HEA only hinted at in the previous books . . .  After so many problems and setbacks, Coal and Chalcedony finally have their Happily Ever After.  Or so they thought.  One more secret lays in the wake.  Is their relationship strong enough to survive the biggest hurdle of them all?
author: Constance Burris
